title: Google and Spotify team up on new ‘User Choice Billing’ for Android, putting pressure on Apple
content:
Spotify is giving Android users more ways to pay when downloading the app from the Google Play Store. “User Choice Billing” provides the option to pay for a subscription through either Spotify’s payment system or with Google Play billing.
